description: Canonical manifest for all governed AI system prompts

domain-01-content.name: Content Creation
domain-01-content.scope: Ideation, creation, editing, and production of content across all formats

domain-02-analysis.name: Analysis & Decision Making
domain-02-analysis.scope: Data analysis, critical thinking, structured reasoning, and decision support

domain-03-project-management.name: Project Management & Planning
domain-03-project-management.scope: Planning, scheduling, execution tracking, and structured delivery management

domain-04-marketing.name: Marketing & Growth
domain-04-marketing.scope: Market positioning, customer acquisition, growth systems, and brand strategy

domain-05-product.name: Product & Services
domain-05-product.scope: Product strategy, feature definition, UX alignment, roadmap design

domain-06-education.name: Education & Learning
domain-06-education.scope: Instructional design, curriculum architecture, and learning systems

domain-07-personal.name: Personal Development & Productivity
domain-07-personal.scope: Individual growth systems, goal setting, habits, productivity optimization

domain-08-business.name: Business & Strategy
domain-08-business.scope: Business models, competitive advantage, operational and strategic planning

domain-09-technical.name: Technical & System Thinking
domain-09-technical.scope: Technical architecture, system modeling, engineering reasoning

domain-10-communication.name: Communication & Presentation
domain-10-communication.scope: Message clarity, presentation structure, narrative strategy

product-thinker.name: Product Thinker
product-thinker.purpose: Data-informed, technically-feasible product strategy and roadmap design

growth-operator.name: Growth Operator
growth-operator.purpose: Data-driven growth execution and structured marketing systems

learning-designer.name: Learning Designer
learning-designer.purpose: Structured educational experiences with measurable learning outcomes
